long_description: Whoa nelly what a wild ride! You are now floating in the Space Near the Escape Pod. Sorry, just go with it, I can’t always come up with the most fun names, but hey, its descriptive isn’t it? From here you can see the Escape Pod, positioned at the far west end of the ship. As you maneuver your way toward the pod you notice a series of clamp-like objects positioned between the Pod and the main ship. Hm, you may want to check into those a little more closely!
short_description: You are back in the Space Near the Escape Pod. You can see the Escape Pod jutting out from the ship below you. From here you see that you can move back towards the Space Near EVA Prep Chamber.

inventory_list.description: this is the key to the pod
inventory_list.name: key
